controls.name: Access Control Policy
controls.description: An access control policy shall be established, documented and reviewed
evidence: RBAC implementation with 3 roles (Admin, Manager, User)
Access reviews conducted via audit logs

controls.name: User Access Management
controls.description: A formal user registration and de-registration process shall be implemented
evidence: Access rights assigned based on roles

controls.name: System and Application Access Control
controls.description: Access to information and application system functions shall be restricted

controls.name: Logging and Monitoring
controls.description: Event logs recording user activities shall be produced and kept

controls.name: Technical Vulnerability Management
controls.description: Information about technical vulnerabilities shall be obtained in a timely fashion

controls.name: Compliance with Legal Requirements
controls.description: All relevant legislative, statutory, regulatory, and contractual requirements shall be identified
evidence: Audit logs retained per legal requirements
